content: la reyna child s wrap sweater spanish for queen the rich majestic purples of la reyna are fit for any little princess a design by emily dame-gibes skill level intermediate finished size note-this pattern is designed to fit infants ranging in size from 3 months to 12 months it will fit loosely as a jacket for smaller children fit may be altered by tightening the buckle and using different stitches as a buttonhole the current model of this sweater is slightly over 12 months and the sweater still fits with full range of motion finished measurements chest 19 ½ sleeves 7 materials 6 oz bulky weight yarn mc 3 oz bulky weight yarn cc *sample made with lion brand homespun yarn in grape mc and lavender sachet cc size n crochet hook size l crochet hook one jeweled buckle yarn needle measuring tape bits of contrasting yarn for markers gauge 9 double_crochet and 6 row = 4 sweater back foundation chain with mc and size n hook chain 20 row 1 double_crochet in 4th st from hook double_crochet across chain 3 turn 18 double_crochet row 2 skip first double_crochet chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet now and throughout double_crochet in each double_crochet across chain 3 turn 18 double_crochet row 3-10 repeat row 2 at the end of row 10 fasten_off weave in ends right front foundation chain with mc and size n hook chain 30 row 1 half_double_crochet in 4th st from hook half_double_crochet across chain 2 turn 28 half_double_crochet row 2 skip 1st half_double_crochet chain 2 counts as half_double_crochet now and throughout half_double_crochet in next half_double_crochet and in each half_double_crochet across turn 28 half_double_crochet row 3 slip_stitch in 1st 9 half_double_crochet chain 2 does not count as 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next half_double_crochet and each across chain 3 turn 19 double_crochet row 4 skip 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet and in each across turn 19 double_crochet row 5 slip_stitch in 1st 4 double_crochet double_crochet in remaining 15 double_crochet chain 3 turn 15 double_crochet row 6 skip 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next 12 double_crochet leaving last 2 double_crochet unworked turn 13 double_crochet row 7 slip_stitch in 1st 3 double_crochet double_crochet in remaining 10 double_crochet chain 3 turn 10 double_crochet row 8 skip 1st double_crochet double_crochet in each double_crochet across turn 10 double_crochet row 9 slip_stitch in 1st double_crochet double_crochet in remaining 9 double_crochet chain 3 turn 9 double_crochet row 10 skip 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next 7 double_crochet leaving last st unworked turn 8 double_crochet row 11 slip_stitch in 1st 2 double_crochet double_crochet in last 6 double_crochet fasten_off weave in ends 6 double_crochet left front foundation chain with mc and size n hook chain 18 row 1 double_crochet in 4th st from hook double_crochet in each chain across chain 3 turn 16 double_crochet row 2 skip 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next double_crochet across chain 3 turn 16 double_crochet row 3 skip 1st double_crochet double_crochet in next 13 double_crochet leaving last 2 sts unworked turn 14 double_crochet row 4 slip_stitch
